item.title: Swimlane's Research Teams Open Sources pyattck
item.description: As security teams adopt the Mitre ATT&CK Framework to help them identify gaps in their defenses, having a way to identify what malware and tools are being used by specific actors or groups becomes more critical. Additionally, having a way to identify these relationships programatically is even more critical. Today, we are excited to announce the Swimlane research team has released pyattck â€” a Python package to interact with the Mitre ATT&CK Framework.
